question: The India Meteorological Department (IMD) recently celebrated its 145th Foundation Day. IMD functions under which ministry?
option2: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
explanation:
The India Meteorological Department (IMD) is an agency, which functions under the Ministry of Earth Sciences. It is responsible for various functions including meteorological observations, communications, forecasting and weather services.
Recently, the India Meteorological Department (IMD) celebrated its 145th foundation day. The Director General of IMD, also called as the cyclone man, Mrutyunjay Mohapatra has been elected as Member of Executive Council of the World Meteorological Organisation for 2019-2023.
